header.title: PROOF OF CHARITY DAO PROTOCOL
header.subtitle: SETTING ONLINE TRUSTED STANDARD FOR CHARITY USING INTEGRATED WEB3 PROTOCOLS

lastProjects.title: Last projects
lastProjects.subtitle: Learn more about charity projects and donate for a good cause.

description.title: CHERR.IO Vision
description.text1: CHERR.IO is setting an online trusted standard for charity. By using this standard anyone will be able to post a charity project on any platform, and thus benefit from CHERR.IO’s features and functionalities.
description.text2: We envision CHERR.IO as a DAO – community-run and owned, with complete user data ownership, where individuals are empowered and incentivized to maintain the system, and help through direct ownership, and are rewarded for participation. Protocol enables secure, immutable, censorship resistant, scalable & accessible on-chain donations, and presents governance by using the consensus mechanism.

problemAndSolution.title: Problem & Solution
problemAndSolution.subtitle: At vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blan ditiis praes entium volup tatum deleniti.

problem.title: BACKGROUND
problem.text1: Emerging technologies enable helping those who are in need to raise funds and spread the word without the middle-men
problem.text3: No real transparency of where the funds went and how successful was the project
problem.text4: Slow and expensive execution of donations and other charity activities
problem.text5: There is no real privacy & anonymity of the donors, personal data shared with third parties
problem.text7: Current web3 solutions are neither led by, nor designed with the community
problem.text8: The solutions are still too centralized, quite basic and merely enable crypto payments
problem.text9: A new era of brand loyalty in Web3 – rewarding mechanisms
problem.text10: Earning protocols are an emerging trend – DeFi passive income
problem.text11: DeFi may very well present the best opportunity to attract the younger generation

solution.title: Solution
solution.text1: Anyone can list a cause as an inactive project that needs people, so called Cherrions, to activate it and thus receive rewards for their action.
solution.text2: To activate the project, we need Cherrions who show support for the project and back it up with native tokens. When this goal is reached, the project becomes ready for donations
solution.text3: Donors can donate in TRX. To mark the project as successful only 10 % of approximate project value needs to be collected. Project is finished when duration time expires. If we collect more than 60 % of approximate project value we also reward the activators for their support. Donors can vote for credibility of spent funds. Smart Contract releases collecting amount to the end party through milestones every time when conditions are met. Each milestone is completed when organization submits any proof of progress.
solution.text4: CHERR.IO leverages the power of DeFi to fund charity causes. Using an innovative funding mechanism to allow users to contribute to public good while preserving their initial deposit. CHERR.IO enables users to earn APY rewards, while indirectly filling charity pools and donating to charity projects by performing peer-to-peer transactions.

topFeatures.title: CHERR.IO's top features
topFeatures.subtitle: A global ecosystem exploiting every opportunity that Web3 has to offer.

text1.title: Integrated DeFi protocols
text1.subtitle: Using the “money legos” phenomenon (token staking, lending, yield farming, liquidity providing, etc.) enable users to earn APY rewards, while indirectly donating to charity projects by performing DeFi activities

text2.title: Charity Market Analytics
text2.subtitle: An analysis module, with a database of registered charities and their projects’ history and statistics (e.g. “CoinMarketCap”), and an algorithm sorting of organizations determining a trust score (based on transparency and performance), acting as a source of trusted information (e.g. “TripAdvisor”).

text3.title: SBD
text3.subtitle: A soul bound token (received by Cherrions who will show effort to spread the good word around that will enable them more voting power for activating projects and greater CHERR.IO benefits)

text4.title: Metaverse
text4.subtitle: For use case showing, fundraising events, promotion, dCommerce -D2A model

text5.title: NFTs launchpad
text5.subtitle: Selling NFTs and giving a share of profit to charity projects

text6.title: SDK
text6.subtitle: SDK for easy integration as an added value service of Web3 projects

text8.title: Proof of Charity
text8.subtitle: A rewarding gamification system, where community members act as governors – Cherrions, and receive tokens as rewards for online volunteering – any activity with regard to governance, or promotion (sharing projects on social networks has a large community effect and it enables organic marketing)

subscribe.title: Don't miss out, Stay updated
subscribe.subtitle: The power to help and reap rewards is placed back in the hands of the people – where it belongs.
